userStory.what: I want to use a WYSIWYG editor for all long-form Content
userStory.why: so that I don't have to know HTML to update my Content.

question.descricao: Does the user story implementation involve input from the client or the environment?
Does the user story implementation involve input from the client or the environment?

requirements.descricao: Verify that all input (HTML form fields, REST requests, URL parameters, HTTP headers, cookies, batch files, RSS feeds, etc) is validated using positive validation (allow lists). ([C5](https://owasp.org/www-project-proactive-controls/#div-numbering))
